text:
Image zoom The Rock / Instagram

Lately the internet’s been buzzing about Jennifer Lopez and her all-but-confirmed new romance with Drake.

There’s tons of talk about whether their relationship is a publicity stunt, Drake falling head-over-heels for JLo, and reports that the couple is the real deal.

But as it turns out, JLo and Drake aren’t the real dynamic duo after all.

It’s all about JLo and Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson.

No, they’re not a couple—but they are a “couple of gym rats” according to JLo’s Instagram post.

Yesterday, Lopez and Johnson teamed up for a sweat sesh and wee can only imagine the kind of routine they came up with.

“Thanks for the love and for all the positive energy and inspiration you put out into the world!!” JLo wrote in her post, adding the hashtags #hardworkwins and #youcantstopwhatwontstop.

Just thinking about the kind of workouts JLo and The Rock must get up to is exhausting.

Whether it’s on stage…

Or with some heavy-duty weights…

These two know how to get the job done.

But this isn’t their first collab. These two also teamed up for another very special project a couple months back.

Well, kind of.

The Rock and dog-JLo are pretty cute together, but we gotta say, the real deal is hard to beat.

With his sweaty sheen and her gorgeous glow, these two are the ultimate #workoutgoals. Now if only we could keep up! Guess it’s all about that #erryday grind, just like JLo says. Off to cycling disco we go!
title: Jennifer Lopez and The Rock worked out together like total badasses
